title: ZenPkgs Browser v1.0.2 Release
content:
## ANOTHER PATCH?????? 
 short answer: yes. long answer: web dev is stupid 

 basically, what happened was i set extreme values for the glide in animation because i thought they were too low... 

 nope, they weren't... 

 the changes made in v1.0.1 showed that it was just some rendering issue. 

 anyways, enjoy your new cool animations that are more akin to the default window animations in ZenOS 1.0N's gnome desktop, yay!
